access_credentials.notes: Full Squarespace admin access for implementing changes

client_questionnaire.q1_unique_value_proposition: What makes PurdueTHINK different from other consulting services?
client_questionnaire.a1: We're students providing real-world consulting experience while helping companies with strategic challenges at university rates
client_questionnaire.q2_ideal_client_profile: Describe your ideal client (both students and companies)
client_questionnaire.a2: Students: ambitious undergrads wanting consulting experience. Companies: mid-size businesses needing strategic projects with fresh perspectives
client_questionnaire.q3_current_pain_points: What's not working well with your current website?
client_questionnaire.a3: Hard to find contact info, application process unclear, companies don't understand our value proposition
client_questionnaire.q4_success_definition: How will you measure if this optimization was successful?
client_questionnaire.a4: More qualified student applications, more client project inquiries, better search rankings for 'purdue consulting'
client_questionnaire.q5_brand_voice: How should PurdueTHINK sound/feel to visitors?
client_questionnaire.a5: Professional but approachable, innovative, academically rigorous, results-driven
